name: Frog School Shop Class Racing
description:
Short racing game about frogs! Originally for the Frog Mini Jam but misread the dates, whoops! Still finished in 72 hours and rough around the edges.

Plot (missing from into): Frog shop class ends in 10 minutes, but everyone's shelf is crooked! There is only one level left and you must race to get it!

*Frog Mini Jam Limitation- Only One Level

Controls:

  • Keyboard-
  • Gas: W
  • Turn: a/d
  • Brake/Reverse: s
  • Quit Game: Escape Key
  • Controller Support:
  • Turning: Joystick
  • Gas: Button 0 (keep pressing, you'll find it.)

Unfinished/ In-Progress:
Music, Cartoon Water Particle Effects, Intro Story Cutscene, New Skyboxes, and maybe more?
